message: “Children are vulnerable due to age and culture, social media, internet access of traffickers, gangs, girls aging out of the foster care system, runaways, and many other reasons. .”

data.description: A girl - we'll call her Jane - was forced into the sex trade then forced to have an abortion by her older "boyfriend."  "Nobody asked me if I wanted the abort
data.title: Sex Trafficking Victim Forced to Have Abortion: “When I Was Forced to Kill My Baby, I Wanted to Die Too”
